org.cloudcoder.daemon

Class DaemonLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudcoder.daemon.DaemonLauncher

  • public class DaemonLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Launch a daemon process in the background and create a FIFO used to send commands to the daemon.
    Author:
    David Hovemeyer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_STDOUT_LOG_FILE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void launch(java.lang.String instanceName, java.lang.Class<?> daemonClass)
      Launch the daemon as a background process (with a FIFO for communication).
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      This is the main method invoked by the shell command used to start the background process.
      void setJvmOptions(java.lang.String jvmOptions)
      Set options to be passed to the JVM (e.g., "-Xmx1024m -Djavax.net.debug=all").
      void setStdoutLogFile(java.lang.String stdoutLogFile)
      Set the name of the file to which the stdout/stderr of the daemon will be redirected.

      • launch

        public void launch(java.lang.String instanceName,
          java.lang.Class<?> daemonClass)
            throws DaemonException
        Launch the daemon as a background process (with a FIFO for communication).
        Parameters:
        instanceName - the instance name to use
        daemonClass - the daemon class
        Throws:
        DaemonException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the main method invoked by the shell command used to start the background process. This should not be called directly.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
